hero.title: Your trusted partner in exporting premium Egyptian frozen products.
hero.subtitle: We specialize in delivering high-quality frozen vegetables, fruits, and herbs to global markets—ensuring freshness, flavor, and reliability in every shipment.

about.title: Quality is the core of Athenas Foods.
about.subtitle: Our quality standards include:
points: Full compliance with international food safety systems
Strict raw material selection from approved farms
Continuous monitoring at each production stage
Full traceability from farm to container

quote.text: At Athenas Foods, we believe that quality is not just a standard—it's a promise. Every frozen product we export carries with it the dedication of Egyptian farmers and the excellence of our processing facilities.
quote.author: Ahmed Hassan

products.title: Featured Products
products.subtitle: Explore our premium selection of frozen products, carefully selected and processed to maintain the highest quality standards.

categories.title: Product Categories
categories.subtitle: Discover our wide range of frozen products across various categories.

partners.title: Our Global Partners
partners.subtitle: We proudly serve clients across continents, building lasting relationships based on trust and quality.

banner.title: Ready to Source Premium Frozen Products?
banner.subtitle: Partner with Athenas Foods and experience the finest quality Egyptian frozen products. From farm to your facility, we ensure excellence at every step.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products and services.

questions.question: What types of frozen products do you export?
questions.answer: We export a wide variety of frozen products including vegetables (peas, green beans, mixed vegetables), fruits (strawberries, mangoes), herbs, and potato products. All products are IQF processed to maintain freshness.

questions.question: What certifications do you have?
questions.answer: Athenas Foods holds ISO 22000, HACCP, and GLOBALG.A.P certifications. We comply with international food safety standards and undergo regular audits to ensure quality.

questions.question: What is your minimum order quantity?
questions.answer: Our minimum order quantity varies by product but typically starts at one 20-foot container. Contact us for specific product MOQs and pricing.

questions.question: How do you ensure product quality during shipping?
questions.answer: We use refrigerated containers maintained at -18°C throughout the shipping process. Each shipment includes temperature monitoring and documentation for complete traceability.

questions.question: Which countries do you ship to?
questions.answer: We export to over 25 countries across Europe, Middle East, Asia, and Africa. Contact us to confirm shipping availability to your specific location.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for premium Egyptian frozen products. Quality, reliability, and excellence in every shipment.
footer.address: Industrial Zone, 10th of Ramadan City, Egypt

productsPage.title: Our Products
productsPage.subtitle: Discover our premium range of frozen products, carefully sourced and processed to meet international standards.
productsPage.noResults: No products found matching your criteria.

greenPeas.name: Green Peas
greenPeas.description: Premium IQF green peas, carefully selected and processed to preserve freshness, color, and nutritional value. Perfect for soups, salads, and side dishes.

greenBeans.name: Green Beans
greenBeans.description: Fresh whole green beans, IQF processed to maintain crispness and vibrant color. Ideal for stir-fries, casseroles, and healthy side dishes.

okra.name: Okra
okra.description: Traditional Egyptian okra, carefully selected and frozen. Perfect for Middle Eastern dishes and stews.

spinach.name: Spinach
spinach.description: Nutrient-rich frozen spinach, blanched and IQF processed. Great for smoothies, soups, and traditional recipes.

cornKernels.name: Sweet Corn Kernels
cornKernels.description: Golden sweet corn kernels, harvested at peak sweetness and IQF frozen. Perfect for salads, soups, and side dishes.

broccoli.name: Broccoli Florets
broccoli.description: Fresh broccoli florets, carefully cut and IQF processed. Rich in vitamins and perfect for healthy meals.

cauliflower.name: Cauliflower Florets
cauliflower.description: Premium cauliflower florets, IQF processed to maintain texture. Versatile for roasting, steaming, or adding to curries.

carrots.name: Diced Carrots
carrots.description: Sweet Egyptian carrots, diced and IQF frozen. Perfect for soups, stews, and mixed vegetable preparations.

strawberries.name: Strawberries
strawberries.description: Juicy Egyptian strawberries, IQF frozen at peak ripeness. Ideal for desserts, smoothies, and jams.

mangoChunks.name: Mango Chunks
mangoChunks.description: Sweet Egyptian mango chunks, carefully cut and frozen. Perfect for smoothies, desserts, and exotic dishes.

pomegranateSeeds.name: Pomegranate Seeds
pomegranateSeeds.description: Ruby-red pomegranate arils, hand-extracted and IQF frozen. Rich in antioxidants, perfect for salads and toppings.

guava.name: Guava
guava.description: Tropical Egyptian guava, sliced and IQF frozen. Great for juices, desserts, and tropical blends.

frenchFries.name: French Fries
frenchFries.description: Classic straight-cut French fries, par-fried and frozen. Crispy exterior, fluffy interior when prepared.

crinkleCutFries.name: Crinkle Cut Fries
crinkleCutFries.description: Wavy-cut potato fries with extra crunch. Perfect for restaurants, catering, and food service.

potatoWedges.name: Potato Wedges
potatoWedges.description: Seasoned potato wedges, par-fried for convenience. Great as appetizers or side dishes.

molokhia.name: Molokhia (Jute Leaves)
molokhia.description: Traditional Egyptian molokhia leaves, finely chopped and frozen. Essential for authentic Middle Eastern cuisine.

parsley.name: Parsley
parsley.description: Fresh parsley, chopped and IQF frozen. Convenient herb addition for soups, sauces, and garnishes.

dill.name: Dill
dill.description: Aromatic dill, chopped and frozen fresh. Perfect for seafood dishes, salads, and Middle Eastern recipes.

mixedVegetables.name: Mixed Vegetables
mixedVegetables.description: A colorful blend of peas, carrots, corn, and green beans. Convenient and versatile for quick meal preparation.

stirFryMix.name: Stir Fry Mix
stirFryMix.description: Asian-inspired vegetable blend with broccoli, peppers, and snap peas. Ready for quick stir-fry meals.

soupMix.name: Soup Mix
soupMix.description: Hearty vegetable blend designed for soups and stews. Includes carrots, peas, beans, and more.
